computer.builtInGames: Squash, Squash practice, Soccer, Football, Shooting on fix target, Shooting on moving target
computer.coprocessor: On/off, Ball speed pro/am, Ball angle pro/am, Paddle size pro/am, Service manual/auto
computer.description:
In UK, Prinztronic was the market brand used by Dixons Group for their electronics.
This system is original because of its large selector in the middle of the front panel. Small and easy to carry. It offers the classic 6 games of the General Instruments AY-3-8500 chipset, including two shooting games playable with an optional light gun.
This system will be followed by the Videosport 800, which offers more games (8) and a colour display.
computer.keyboard: Two strangely shaped controllers with knobs at the top
computer.language: Squash, Squash practice, Soccer, Football, Shooting on fix target, Shooting on moving target
computer.name: Videosport 600
computer.ports: RF TV video output, gun connector

shot.description: <br><font color="red"><strong>&gt;&nbsp;BOX</strong></font><br><blockquote>Notice the "Simply Plug-in and Play" statement! Quite impressive 20 years before Microsoft and its "Plug&Play" marketing label...<
